Downloader¶

Downloader Class module

Downloader(dataset, fipsList[, config])

A downloader to download data for Census Geography

API Docs¶

class socioFetcher.downloader.Downloader(dataset, fipsList, config=<socioFetcher.config.Config object>)[source]¶
A downloader to download data for Census Geography

given configration from BLS, BEA, or Census.

dataset¶

List of dataset name, value must be must be one of BLS, BEA,BEAGDP, or ACS

Type

List

fipsList¶

List of FIPS code

Type

List

data¶

dict to save downloaded data

Type

dict

options¶

Including years, Industries code, table name, subject, detail

Type

dict, optional

export(path, summarize=False, by='geography')[source]¶

Save downloaded data to specified path

Parameters

  • path (str) -- Abosolute path to a folder where files will be saved

  • summarize (bolean, optional) -- Save summarized data, default is False

  • by (str) -- Summarize option, one of geography and dataset

Returns

Return type

None

get_choro_data(dataset)[source]¶

Generate choropleth data for mapping use in MapView

Parameters

dataset (str) -- The name of the dataset to be ploted in choropleth map

Returns

choro_data

Return type

dict {attributeName=>{year=>{areaID=>value}}}

get_geojson_from_TIGER(fipsList, outFields=['GEOID'], geo='county')[source]¶

Get geojson from Census TIGER REST API(Only support county level for now)

Parameters

  • fipsList (list of str) -- Requested FIPS code list

  • outFields (list) -- Fields included in the geojson response, default is ["GEOID"]

  • geo (str) -- default is "county", (Only support County)

Returns

geojson -- GeoJSON obj

Return type

dict

mapping(dataset=None)[source]¶

Mapping the selected downloaded data in form of Interactive map :param dataset: The name of dataset to be mapped :type dataset: str

Returns

mapView

Return type

SocioFetcher.MapView

summarize(by='geography')[source]¶

Process downloaded data and produce summrized table by either geography or dataset

Parameters

by (str) -- On which summarize will based on, must be one of geography and dataset

Returns

tableDict -- key: Name of Geography or Name of dataset value: pandas.DataFrame

dict
